caption: Two people are walking in a bustling city center surrounded by shops. The shops are filled with people coming and going. The two individuals, one shorter and one taller, are glancing around, appearing to be searching for something amidst the bustling crowd.In another location, a small harbor is depicted with several boats setting sail. A man attempts to board one of the boats but is ridiculed by the crew members, leaving him visibly angry yet powerless.In yet another scene, a room is occupied by several elderly individuals dressed in black clothing engaged in conversation.
